item.title: James Corden’s Emotional Farewell on ‘The Late Late Show’ Sees Record-Breaking 1.43M Viewers and Star-Studded Guest Lineup
item.dc:creator: Kanishka
item.category: The Late Late Show with James Corden
item.description:
James Corden’s Final Episode Draws 1.43M Viewers James Corden bid farewell to CBS ‘The Late Late Show’ with a record-breaking audience on Thursday night. The final episode drew 1.43 million viewers, an impressive 77% increase from the show’s season-to-date average live+same-day viewership of about 806,000. It was also the show’s largest audience on any day […]

James Corden’s Emotional Farewell on ‘The Late Late Show’ Sees Record-Breaking 1.43M Viewers and Star-Studded Guest Lineup
item.content:encoded:
James Corden’s Final Episode Draws 1.43M Viewers

James Corden bid farewell to CBS ‘The Late Late Show’ with a record-breaking audience on Thursday night. The final episode drew 1.43 million viewers, an impressive 77% increase from the show’s season-to-date average live+same-day viewership of about 806,000. It was also the show’s largest audience on any day of the week since January 2021 following the AFC Championship Game.

Star-Studded Farewell Show and Primetime Special

To help say goodbye to its late-night star, CBS set aside an hour in primetime for a pre-taped special that included video montages and candy-coated skits so Corden could show off his singing chops. The primetime special averaged 3.65 million total viewers, up 32% from the 2.77M viewers who tuned in for the 2019 episode.

Corden’s Final Guests and Carpool Karaoke

James Corden ended his eight-year run as host with his final guests Will Ferrell and Harry Styles, as well as one last edition of Carpool Karaoke with his old pal Adele. Throughout his final season, Corden earned 523 million video views. Adele’s final Carpool Karaoke posted a bit early on April 24, currently has 13.1 million views on YouTube.

The Late Late Show Takes Over Social Media

Late-night TV often does pretty well on social media, as clips from the surface of the interview. According to CBS, Thursday’s episode of ‘The Late Late Show’ was the #1 social non-sports program on broadcast TV.

FAQ

What was the audience size for the final episode of ‘The Late Late Show’?

The final episode of ‘The Late Late Show’ drew 1.43 million viewers, a 77% increase from the show’s season-to-date average live+same-day viewership of about 806,000.

Who were James Corden’s final guests?

James Corden’s final guests on ‘The Late Late Show’ were Will Ferrell and Harry Styles, as well as one last edition of Carpool Karaoke with Adele.

How did ‘The Late Late Show’ perform on social media?

According to CBS, Thursday’s episode of ‘The Late Late Show’ was the #1 social non-sports program on broadcast TV. Clips from the interviews often do well on social media.

How many views did Adele’s final Carpool Karaoke receive?

Adele’s final Carpool Karaoke posted a bit early on April 24, currently has 13.1 million views on YouTube.

Source: Deadline

James Corden’s Emotional Farewell on ‘The Late Late Show’ Sees Record-Breaking 1.43M Viewers and Star-Studded Guest Lineup

It was also the show's largest audience on any day of the week since January 2021 following the AFC Championship Game.

item.title: Loni Willison, Baywatch star Jeremy Jackson’s ex-wife spotted searching for food in a dumpster
item.dc:creator: Simranjit
item.description:
Baywatch star, Jeremy Jackson’s ex-wife, Loni Willison was seen looking for food in a dumpster in Los Angeles. The 39-year-old former model has been living in homeless camps in California for the past seven years, according to reports. Loni Willison, who used to model for a lot of magazines, was first seen living on the […]

Loni Willison, Baywatch star Jeremy Jackson’s ex-wife spotted searching for food in a dumpster
item.content:encoded:
Baywatch star, Jeremy Jackson’s ex-wife, Loni Willison was seen looking for food in a dumpster in Los Angeles.

The 39-year-old former model has been living in homeless camps in California for the past seven years, according to reports.

Loni Willison, who used to model for a lot of magazines, was first seen living on the streets of LA in 2016.

The former cover girl was seen pushing her shopping cart through the streets of Santa Monica in pictures taken just this week. And while she did it, Loni Willison looked messy, had short hair, and had missing teeth.

 

Loni Willison’s life seemed to fall apart after she broke up with Jeremy Jackson, a hot TV star.

She was married to the Baywatch star from 2012 to 2014.

While on the outside it seemed like their romance was picture perfect, Loni later claimed that Jeremy was physically abusive behind closed doors,

per Daily Mail.

She alleged that their marriage was secretly filled with explosive drunken rows and nasty physical altercations that left her fearing for her life and suffering from multiple broken bones.

The couple’s rocky marriage ended when, according to reports, Jeremy tried to strangle Loni Willison during a drunken fight.

After they broke up, the 42-year-old actor was on the 2015 season of Celebrity Big Brother.

On the other hand, Willison is said to have struggled with addiction and mental health issues after being in a bad relationship. Since then, she has been seen on the streets a lot, looking like she is homeless and digging through trash to find food.

Willison lost her job at a cosmetic surgery center in Los Angeles because she went crazy two years after she and Jackson broke up. She lost her apartment, car, and savings, so she was forced to live on the streets of the city.

After being found on the streets of LA in 2020, Loni told The Sun that she didn’t want anyone’s help.

I haven’t spoken to Jeremy. I don’t want to speak to my friends, I’m doing just fine. I don’t want anyone to help me. I can live on my own. I’ve got everything I need right here. Nobody really cares about me and I don’t want to see them, they don’t want to see me.

She told the outlet,

I haven’t got a cell phone. I’ve got food and I’ve got a place to sleep. I get money here and there and there’s food in the bins and near the stores. There’s lots here.

The beauty model who was once on the cover of Australia’s Glam Fit magazine went missing in October 2018 after a friend tried to get her to go to rehab.

The blonde, who has several missing teeth, had been battling an addiction to crystal meth and alcohol, as well as mental health issues,

The Sun reported in 2020.

The ex-wife of Jeremy Jackson often drags her broken-down cart around the streets of Los Angeles in search of food and clothes in dumpsters.

Loni Willison, Baywatch star Jeremy Jackson’s ex-wife spotted searching for food in a dumpster

item.title: Andrew Tate claims to have been “poisoned” and shares video of his health getting “worse”
item.dc:creator: Simranjit
item.description:
Andrew Tate claims that he has been poisoned, and has posted unusual videos of his supposedly worsening health. The 36-year-old controversial social media influencer, who became famous for his posts about masculinity, has had a rough few months. On December 29, he and his brother Tristan were arrested in Romania while police looked into allegations […]

Andrew Tate claims to have been “poisoned” and shares video of his health getting “worse”
item.content:encoded:
Andrew Tate claims that he has been poisoned, and has posted unusual videos of his supposedly worsening health.

The 36-year-old controversial social media influencer, who became famous for his posts about masculinity, has had a rough few months. On December 29, he and his brother Tristan were arrested in Romania while police looked into allegations of s*xual assault, exploitation, organized crime, and human trafficking.

Romania’s Directorate for Investigating Organized Crime and Terrorism (DIICOT) caught the brothers along with two women in the same case.

They spent 30 days in a detention center and had their time there extended several times. Their requests to be set free were also turned down.

But on March 31, they were finally let go and put under house arrest by Romanian officials. The arrest was supposed to end, but it was just extended for another 30 days. This means that the brothers won’t be able to leave until at least May 29, while officials continue to look into what happened.

Since he has been on house arrest, Andrew Tate has posted a number of mysterious videos and messages, including a Tweet in which he seems to say that he will be shot as soon as he is freed.

I prepare my body to absorb the brutal kinetics of piercing lead,

he wrote.

As all other silencing attempts fail, and stage 3 approaches – I anticipate a bullet will be the chosen utensil of pacification. I can only pray and prepare. I will force myself to breathe the best I can. I promise.

Now, the former Big Brother contestant, who has denied all the accusations against him and Tristan, has said on his Twitter page that he may have been poisoned and had a bad reaction.

Andrew Tate penned in a now-deleted tweet:

Face swollen. Blood pressure is through the roof. Skins on fire. Hard to breathe. Some sort of severe reaction or poison. Only had coffee and water so far today. All appeared in the last 5mins,

alongside a picture and video showing the severity of the issue.

Andrew Tate gets "some sort of severe reaction or poison". Swollen face and can't breathe properly!

The Matrix is after @Cobratate pic.twitter.com/ge3L4bRrOL

— Jeckov Kanani (@JeckovKanani) April 27, 2023

After that, Andrew Tate’s account, which was apparently updated by a third party, said that he wasn’t going to take medicine because he was afraid a doctor would kill him with injections. In another message, they wrote that he has no allergies and won’t do anything.

Andrew is not allergic to anything,

one post read, according to The Mirror.

This has never happened before. Has only had water and coffee today. Either an insect bite or some matrix attack insanity in his bottled water. He’s refusing doctors and is focusing on tea and breathing. Will keep you all updated.

 

Andrews fine. Says that pain is part of life. He says the doctor will inject him with ‘who knows what’ and kill him. He’s in lotus position and drinking tea. As long as he can breathe he refuses medical attention – so far so good. The question is where this came from,

they added.

30 more days on house arrest.

30 more days suppressed.

No EMs.

I havnt been free for a single day this year.

The battle rages against Shaitan. pic.twitter.com/4dALlZvz6A

— Andrew Tate (@Cobratate) April 21, 2023

The former kickboxing world champion is being held as part of an investigation, and he is also being sued by three women who say he r*ped and abused them.

 

According to Sky News, the women made these accusations against Andrew Tate in 2015, which is eight years ago.

However, detectives on the case didn’t take them seriously, so the case was eventually dropped.

Since 2013, the alleged victims had been working as webcam models for Andrew Tate in Luton, where they said they were mistreated, underpaid, and threatened so they wouldn’t go to the police.

Andrew Tate claims to have been “poisoned” and shares video of his health getting “worse”

item.title: Brittney Griner reduced to tears at press conference following release from Russian prison
item.dc:creator: Simranjit
item.description:
Brittney Griner was reduced to tears during her first press conference since she got out of Russian prison. The 32-year-old WNBA star got emotional when she saw a Phoenix Mercury reporter for the first time since she was released in 2022. Since being released from detention in Russia in December, the athlete had not been […]

Brittney Griner reduced to tears at press conference following release from Russian prison
item.content:encoded:
Brittney Griner was reduced to tears during her first press conference since she got out of Russian prison.

The 32-year-old WNBA star got emotional when she saw a Phoenix Mercury reporter for the first time since she was released in 2022.

Since being released from detention in Russia in December, the athlete had not been able to talk to reporters or the media until the press conference.

Aw, so good to see you,

Brittney Griner said after recognizing the reporter in the crowd. Both of them were having trouble speaking through their tears. When the reporter asked Brittney Griner how she had the courage to tell her story, she had tears in her eyes.

See, you’re crying and now you made me cry,

Griner responded.

 

Brittney Griner gets emotional at her first press conference after getting out of prison:

You know, I’m no stranger to hard times. Just digging deep honestly, you’re going to be faced with adversities throughout your life – this was a pretty big one,

she thought back on the 10 months she spent in Russian custody. The basketball player also said that she “relied” on her “hard work” to get through the situation.

I know this sounds so small, but you know, dying in practice and just hard workouts, you find a way to just grind it out. Put your head down and keep moving,

she added saying that she never stopped moving while she was in a Russian prison.

That was my thing…never get too focused on the now.

Later, Brittney Griner also talked about what she had learned since her first arrest in February 2022.

Life is short. Things can change at the stroke of a match. Appreciate every moment. Don’t take it for granted, but it’s so true. Once something like this happens to you, when people say that it hits home, it hits closer to you,

she admitted, per People.

Griner did tell reporters, though, that she would not play basketball overseas again.

I’m never going overseas to play again unless I’m representing my country at the Olympics. If I make that team, that would be the only time I would leave the US soil, and that’s just to represent the USA.

 

I’ll say this, the whole reason a lot of us go over is the pay gap. A lot of us go over there to make an income, to support our families, to support ourselves,

Griner explained that she only played in international leagues outside of the United States during the basketball offseason to make money since men’s basketball players make a lot more.

Brittney Griner reduced to tears at press conference following release from Russian prison

media:content.media:title: Brittney Griner reduced to tears at press conference following release from Russian prison

item.title: Boruto Manga: Handling of Sarada is Completely Disrespectful
item.dc:creator: Vidushi
item.description:
The Boruto Manga Continues to Perpetuate Gender Stereotypes in Chapter 78 and Beyond. The pattern of showing disrespect towards female shinobi in Boruto Manga and Anime is evident through the portrayal of Sarada, Sasuke’s daughter. Although the mistreatment that she endures could potentially happen to any male character, it is the recurrence of such offenses […]

Boruto Manga: Handling of Sarada is Completely Disrespectful
item.content:encoded:
The Boruto Manga Continues to Perpetuate Gender Stereotypes in Chapter 78 and Beyond.

The pattern of showing disrespect towards female shinobi in Boruto Manga and Anime is evident through the portrayal of Sarada, Sasuke’s daughter. Although the mistreatment that she endures could potentially happen to any male character, it is the recurrence of such offenses against both her and her gender that is inexcusable. This is not the first instance of Boruto being guilty of such behavior, and the persistent portrayal of female shinobi in a derogatory manner highlights a deep-seated problem within the series.

In Boruto Manga chapter 78 : Naruto Next Generations, created and supervised by Masashi Kishimoto, illustrated by Mikio Ikemoto, and written by Ukyo Kodachi, Sarada demonstrates bravery and loyalty by coming to Boruto’s aid upon learning of a rogue Kawaki’s plan to eliminate him. However, despite her valiant efforts, she finds herself in a dangerous situation that ultimately necessitates Boruto’s intervention to protect her. This turn of events not only puts Boruto’s safety at risk but also perpetuates the problematic trend of female shinobi being portrayed as helpless and in need of male rescue, an all-too-common trope in the Naruto universe.

Boruto Manga: Undermining Sarada’s Heroic Deed

 

Despite Sarada’s proven competence as a shinobi, her act of bravery in saving Boruto was supposed to be a pivotal moment for her character, but instead, Boruto exploited it to mock and belittle her. In risking her life to save her friend and potential love interest, she found herself in the midst of the first confrontation between two key characters at a critical point in the manga. However, the author failed to challenge the typical gender stereotypes present in fiction by portraying Sarada, who was once a heroic figure, as a “damsel in distress” who required Boruto’s intervention to rescue her, resulting in him suffering severe injuries at his own expense.

Ironically, one of Sarada’s most significant moments in the Boruto Manga was marred by the way it happened. In earlier chapters 41 and 42, Kawaki tells Sarada how to use her family’s Sharingan, despite only having learned about its abilities himself moments earlier. This could be viewed as further evidence of how Sasuke’s absence has affected Sarada’s understanding of her powers.

[Redditors expressed disappointment and frustration at Sasuke’s prolonged absence from Sarada’s life]

However, the fact that a male character had to instruct a female character on how to fight raises questions about gender roles and reinforces a troubling trend of male characters dominating and dictating female characters’ actions and abilities in the story.

Boruto Manga: Hinata’s Character Falls Prey to Stereotypical Portrayal

These regressive and unwarranted gender biases serve to underscore how Boruto consistently mistreats its female shinobi. Hinata is perhaps the most glaring example of this. While her role as a homemaker is not inherently problematic, the series portrays her as constantly failing in this role, causing her son to comfort her while he is on the verge of risking his life. Furthermore, there are instances when Hinata supposedly fights in Boruto, but the show chooses to omit these scenes, or she is presented with an ideal adversary, such as Ao, who is infamous for murdering her clan, but has no role in his defeat. This is not to mention the vast majority of other female fighters who are either overlooked or relegated to stereotypical roles like running flower shops, despite years of battlefield experience. In light of all this, it is clear that having Sarada fail to rescue Boruto and necessitate his rescue instead is entirely disrespectful and unwarranted.

Boruto Manga: Handling of Sarada is Completely Disrespectful

media:content.media:title: Boruto Manga: Handling of Sarada is Completely Disrespectful
media:content.media:description: The Boruto Manga Continues to Perpetuate Gender Stereotypes in Chapter 78 and Beyond.

item.title: Family Guy Movie Dilemma: Why It’s Been a Decade and Still No Film
item.dc:creator: Charlie
item.description:
Family Guy Movie? Despite the series’ continued success on TV, the executive producers behind the show have yet to make the jump to the big screen. Unlike The Simpsons and Bob’s Burgers, which have had their own feature films, Family Guy has only had a feature-length home media release. Even though the show has seen […]

Family Guy Movie Dilemma: Why It’s Been a Decade and Still No Film
item.content:encoded:
Family Guy Movie? Despite the series’ continued success on TV, the executive producers behind the show have yet to make the jump to the big screen. Unlike The Simpsons and Bob’s Burgers, which have had their own feature films, Family Guy has only had a feature-length home media release. Even though the show has seen monumental success ever since 20th Century Fox brought it back from the cancellation, a proper movie adaptation has not yet been made.

During a recent interview with Emmy Magazine, Family Guy executive producers Alec Sulkin and Rich Appel discussed why a Family Guy movie has yet to materialize. They attributed the delay to the fact that series creator Seth MacFarlane has been busy with several other projects. Although the producers joked about some of MacFarlane’s cinematic misses, they made it clear that his schedule has been the primary factor preventing the development of a movie.

Will There Be A Family Guy Movie?

When questioned about the possibility of a movie, executive producer Alec Sulkin pointed out that movies can be unpredictable. He referenced some of Seth MacFarlane’s previous cinematic efforts, such as Ted 2, which were not as successful as the original. Rich Appel, on the other hand, provided a more specific reason why a Family Guy movie hasn’t been made yet. According to him, Seth MacFarlane is too busy with other projects, including the Ted TV series and book club, to devote time to a movie. Unfortunately, this means that fans may have to wait even longer for the much-anticipated movie of the beloved series.

Along with the show’s success, the talented and star-studded Family Guy cast has also helped propel the show forward. Lead actor and creator Seth MacFarlane voices several of the Family Guy characters, including Peter, Stewie, and Brian, among others. The rest of the cast includes Alex Borstein, Mila Kunis, Seth Green, and Mike Henry. The show’s recent two-season pick-up and renewal through 2025 by 20th Television Animation ensures that the cast and crew will continue their journey, possibly culminating in a movie one day.

join me tonight or this will be you: pic.twitter.com/FnvohBD5sz

— Family Guy (@FamilyGuyonFOX) April 30, 2023

Would you like to see a Family Guy Movie? We say ‘Bring it On!’

Also Read- Brad Pitt accuses ex-wife Angelina Jolie of Sabotaging their Winery’s Reputation on Purpose.

 

Family Guy Movie Dilemma: Why It’s Been a Decade and Still No Film

item.title: How To Watch Scream VI Free Online? Detailed Streaming Guide
item.dc:creator: Akash
item.description:
Want to know how to watch Scream VI free online? Scream VI, the horror smash that debuted in theatres six weeks ago, will be accessible on one of the big streaming platforms this week, so if that’s what you’re looking for, you’re in luck. With nearly $170 million in worldwide total earnings, Scream VI is […]

How To Watch Scream VI Free Online? Detailed Streaming Guide
item.content:encoded:
Want to know how to watch Scream VI free online? Scream VI, the horror smash that debuted in theatres six weeks ago, will be accessible on one of the big streaming platforms this week, so if that’s what you’re looking for, you’re in luck.

With nearly $170 million in worldwide total earnings, Scream VI is the highest-grossing Scream picture and the first horror film to achieve more than $100 million in the United States since Scream 2. Scream VI cast includes renowned names like Melissa Barrera, Jenna Ortega, Hayden Panettiere, Courteney Cox, Jasmin Savoy Brown, and Josh Segarra among others.

Scream VI Plot Summary

Someone known as “Ghostface” has returned. Following an 11-year hiatus between the fourth and fifth movies, fans now get access to the sixth chapter of the popular slasher genre with the release of Scream 6 this week. Tara and Samantha leave Woodsboro, California, to begin a new life in New York City in Scream VI, played by Jenna Ortega and Melissa Barrera. However, a new Ghostface assassin soon starts to attack them.

reminder there wouldn’t be scream without her pic.twitter.com/V0pWF7ELj1

— ☆ | SCREAM VI (@starzlumax) April 20, 2023

After the recent Ghostface murders in Woodsboro, the four surviving victims relocated to New York City to start again. Unfortunately, just as they were starting to get back to normal, they got that phone call. The new Ghostface is more vicious and merciless in the pursuit of his prey than ever previously.

Scream VI Streaming Guide

Social media has been buzzing with queries from fans regarding how to watch Scream VI free online.

Scream VI is currently available in the United States for $19.99 via digital stores such as Amazon Prime Video, iTunes, and Vudu, and can be seen instantly on Paramount+.

To watch without interruptions, subscribe to the Premium plan for just $9.99 per month, or save money by paying $99.99 upfront for the full year. (Premium includes local CBS station). Live TV broadcasts will still feature ads, and certain episodes will have short promotions for new Paramount+ content. Fans would be happy to know that there’s an option to  watch Scream VI free online.

The digital version is now available for pre-order on iTunes and Amazon Prime Video. The DVD, Blu-ray, and 4K Ultra HD editions, like the digital release, are available for pre-order, but there is no word on when they will be ready. Fans may now replay the train scene as many times as they want now that it has been digitally distributed in the United States, in order to find all the hidden links to not just the Scream films, but horror films in general.

Paramount+ plans for customers

Paramount+ customers may combine with Showtime to watch Scream VI free online and other original shows including Yellowjackets, Your Honour, George and Tammy, and more. Showtime streams Oscar-winning films like Everything Everywhere All at Once. Essential and Premium plans with Showtime cost $11.99/month or $119.99/year. Yes, indeed! Both plans cost the same!

Paramount+ has two subscription packages and a bundle. The $4.99 Paramount+ Essential plan with commercials does not include your local CBS channel. A year-long $49.99 Paramount+ membership saves 16%.

How To Watch Scream VI free online in the USA?

In the United States, a Paramount+ membership costs $4.99 per month or $49.99 per year, and an ad-free subscription costs $9.99 per month or $99.99 per year. Do you desire to watch Scream VI free online? New customers may take advantage of a free seven-day trial period. The free trial option is ideal for new users.

How to watch Scream VI  in Uk/Australia?

Scream VI will not be accessible for home viewing in the United Kingdom/Australia for some time, and no plans for digital release have been disclosed. Subscribers of Paramount+ in the United Kingdom/Australia will have to wait till it is available on the service.

The Scream films have dependably been excellent, and this tendency is unlikely to alter in the near future. Scream 6 received a perfect nine out of 10 from us for its exceptional character development, amazing set pieces, and unique storyline. This film is required watching for every Scream franchise enthusiast.

How To Watch Scream VI Free Online? Detailed Streaming Guide

item.title: No, One Piece Chapter 1083 Spoilers Aren’t Out Yet. The Reddit Post is a Fake
item.dc:creator: Kanishka
item.description:
There were some recent rumors about the One Piece Chapter 1083 spoilers going around on the internet. How true are these spoilers and when will the chapter be released? Read on to find out more. One Piece Chapter 1083 Spoilers according to Reddit A Redditor by the username u/CocaPepsiPepper posted a series of One Piece […]

No, One Piece Chapter 1083 Spoilers Aren’t Out Yet. The Reddit Post is a Fake
item.content:encoded:
There were some recent rumors about the One Piece Chapter 1083 spoilers going around on the internet. How true are these spoilers and when will the chapter be released?

Read on to find out more.

One Piece Chapter 1083 Spoilers according to Reddit

A Redditor by the username u/CocaPepsiPepper posted a series of One Piece chapter 1083 spoilers on the r/Piratefolk subreddit. The spoilers were as follows:

  • “Mihawk decides to take down Red Haired first. He tracks him across the planet with his Observation and uses his Armament to stretch his strike across the Grand Line
  • Shanks blocks it and uses his Conqueror to launch his ship to Buggy’s island from Elbaf
  • Mihawk and Shanks clash, splitting the sky two different ways and literally shaking the Grand Line
  • Mihawk observes Marineford to see what they’re saying, Sengoku says that the Marines purposefully pushed false Kaido hype and that both Shanks and Mihawk are fitting contestants for the title of WSC/WSM.
  • Mihawk tries to find Akainu but he’s not at Marineford.
  • Cut to Kamabaka, Dragon is looking out at the sea, which is evaporating. Akainu is sprinting head-first to the island.
  • Dragon is revealed to have an awakened Weather Logia and he summons a rainstorm. The rain and wind is covered in CoA and the lightning is black like CoC.
  • Akainu burns through the weather with a Hell Hound the size of Kamabaka, Dragon is a bit scared.
  • Sabo leaps ahead of Dragon and coats his pipe in ACoC, knocking the Hell Hound away.
  • Akainu coats his own fist in ACoC, flies up to Sabo with his magma flight and they clash in an epic double-page spread with the Moon in the background, an explosion is happening on the Moon.
  • Cut to space, we are Enel commenting on the size of the CoC clashes going on, visible from space. Enel is fighting somebody using his awakened Goro Goro Fruit power which allows him to use pure Conqueror’s.
  • Enel’s opponent is the eleventh Titanic Captain, Urouge, who ate the Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Jesus Christ. Urouge is trying to recruit or kill Enel.
  • Final page shows all these events being viewed through Observation, manifested as a screen, in the Room of Flowers. Imu is watching it while conversing with a man who is chained to the final Road Poneglyph in the back of the room. The man is Rocks D. Xebec.” 

How fake are these One Piece Chapter 1083 spoilers?

Many comments under the post started calling out the OP on the fake spoilers. Some were sarcastic, while others were funny. A user, u/Prize-Nothing8067, commented, “You forgot the part where Sanji breaks his leg against Jack (Sanji taking an L in early spoilers is mandatory)”. While some critical comments were being downvoted for being mean.

The real reason everyone knows this is fake is that the spoilers for One Piece chapter 1082 have not yet been leaked. The chapter is said to be released on May 7th, 2023. More details on the release date can be found here. With spoilers for chapter 1082 just released as of yet, it will be hard to predict the next chapter. This is a blatant giveaway. Of course, the post was intended to be funny and sarcastic and not meant to be taken seriously. There are some theories available on Youtube that are a lot more believable than this Reddit post.

Source: Reddit

No, One Piece Chapter 1083 Spoilers Aren’t Out Yet. The Reddit Post is a Fake

item.title: One Piece Episode 1061 Release Date, Time, Preview, Watch Online, and More
item.dc:creator: Prashant Chaudhary
item.description:
One Piece Episode 1061 is the most anticipated episode, as the hype created by fans for the upcoming episode is real. In the last episode, we saw the final battle taking place between all key players. One Piece Episode 1061 Release Date Schedule is Out One Piece Episode 1061 is set to air on May […]

One Piece Episode 1061 Release Date, Time, Preview, Watch Online, and More
item.content:encoded:
One Piece Episode 1061 is the most anticipated episode, as the hype created by fans for the upcoming episode is real. In the last episode, we saw the final battle taking place between all key players.

One Piece Episode 1061 Release Date Schedule is Out

One Piece Episode 1061 is set to air on May 7th, 2023. The episode will come out at 9:30 AM as per Japan standard time.

#ONEPIECE1061

ONE PIECE EPISODE 1061 PREVIEW

Episode Title: "Attack of the Devil! Sanji Vs. Queen"

Release Date: May 07, 2023 (09:30 am Japan Time)

▪︎ In this Episode, the Finale of Sanji Vs. Queen🔥 pic.twitter.com/qZGskUYvJl

— ONE PIECE (ワンピース) Spoilers (@OP_SPOILERS2023) April 30, 2023

The preview of episode 1061 is already revealed, and as per the plotline, Sanji and Queen’s battle will peak, and Sanji will get attacked by Cyborg.

IFRIT JAMBE NEXT EPISODE!!!

Wano climax begins next week with the Sanji's fight!#ONEPIECE1060 #onepiece1061 pic.twitter.com/y0mg75JWn2

— SomiL (@SomilS26) April 30, 2023

One Piece Episode 1061 Spoilers Are Out on the Internet

The last episode of One Piece revealed the heated battle between Queen and Sanji. In the battle, Queen’s attack reminds Sanji of Germa. However, Sanji is able to get over Germa’s memories and unleashes a special technique, and he uses that technique to end the battle.

#ONEPIECE1060

ONE PIECE EPISODE 1060 PREVIEW

Episode Title: "Secrets of Enma! The Sword Entrusted to Zoro"

Release Date: April 30, 2023 (09:30 am Japan Time)

▪︎ We will see in this episode Zoro's awakening of Advanced Conqueror's Haki🔥 pic.twitter.com/t9oRvrIZvV

— ONE PIECE (ワンピース) Spoilers (@OP_SPOILERS2023) April 23, 2023

Episode 1061 is titled “The Strike of an Ifrit!” which will showcase how Sanji uses his Ifrit Jambe to defeat the Queen. Ifrit Jambe is a powerful form of Diable Jambe in which the speed and weight of Sanji’s kicks increase.

TOEI EXTENDED THE FIGHT!!! THE CHOREOGRAPHY🔥🔥🔥 #ONEPIECE1060 pic.twitter.com/8Z2JnhGYfb

— Julien (@longlivejulien1) April 30, 2023

What Happened in the One Piece Episode 1060? The Recap

Kaido is facing Luffy, Kid, and Law are facing Big Mom, while Sanji and Zoro are facing Queen and King in the battle.

In episode 1060 of One Piece, we also see that Zoro has defeated the King, but it is very difficult to get through King’s body for some weird reason. Queen said that King was part of a race which is called Lunarian. The Lunarian race was considered to be Gods at one time.

Where to Watch One Piece Episode 1061 Online?

Episode 1061 of One Piece will be streaming on Crunchyroll on the above-mentioned date. Fans can also watch episode 1061 later on Netflix.

One Piece Episode 1061 Release Date, Time, Preview, Watch Online, and More

Where to Watch Naruto & Naruto Shippuden English Dubbed? Crunchyroll, Vudu, Hulu & Netflix Streaming Guide
item.content:encoded:
There are indeed many ways to watch Naruto & Naruto Shippuden English Dubbed. But some platforms might not have every dubbed episode. Can you watch Naruto: Shippuden English dubbed on Hulu, Vudu, AnimeLab, Adult Swim, etc? Let us dig into the same in this article.

Created by Masashi Kishimoto, Naruto has managed to establish its name and presence in the anime market. Naruto: Shippuden released immediately in 2007 after the completion of the original Naruto

Both the series boast a passionate fanbase. This popularity has led to the series being dubbed in several universal languages. This article explores the options to enjoy watching Naruto & Naruto Shippuden English Dubbed.

Where to watch Naruto & Naruto Shippuden English Dubbed?

See currently you can enjoy the dubbed episodes only on Funimation and Hulu. Even though both platforms do not have every dubbed episode available, it’s still an ideal option compared to other streaming platforms.

Still wild that these 2 characters are voiced by the same person pic.twitter.com/ctsjOoPG98

— Professional Simp (@antwannathaniel) April 22, 2023

Watch Naruto & Naruto Shippuden English Dubbed On Crunchyroll

Crunchyroll contains a huge collection of all 21 seasons (over 500 episodes) of Naruto: Shippuden. Crunchyroll is a popular platform for watching anime in places like the United States, Canada, and some parts of Asia. You have the option to watch the series for free on Crunchyroll. The problem is that most episodes are in Japanese with English subtitles. You can find only a few episodes dubbed in English.

Watch Naruto & Naruto Shippuden English Dubbed On Netflix

Naruto & Naruto Shippuden English Dubbed is available to watch on Netflix, Netflix has several episodes dubbed in English. So you can enjoy watching the dubbed episodes on this platform.

Watch Naruto & Naruto Shippuden English Dubbed on Hulu & Vudu

Another option to watch dubbed episodes of this series is to get a Hulu or Vudu subscription. You can find several dubbed episodes on both platforms. Since Hulu offers a free trial as well so you will be able to watch for free.

The voice actor of Gaara did so good on this scene https://t.co/ed4rkmxEyM pic.twitter.com/nI3Nftikyt

— ✿ ᴄʜᴏᴄᴏ ✿❀🍀 (@ch__cco) April 21, 2023

Naruto English Dubbed Cast

Naruto has been voiced by Maile Flanagan for the dubbed episodes. The makers roped in popular voice actors for the English dub including Yuri Lowenthal for Sasuke Uchiha and Kate Higgins for Sakura.

Don’t be tempted to stream the dubbed episodes on pirated websites. It can put your data in danger. Only browse the official streaming platforms to watch Naruto: Shippuden.

Right now many episodes of Naruto: Shippuden haven’t been dubbed in English. We’ll keep you updated in case all Naruto & Naruto Shippuden English Dubbed episodes are released on any platform- Crunchyroll, Funimation or Netflix.

Where to Watch Naruto & Naruto Shippuden English Dubbed? Crunchyroll, Vudu, Hulu & Netflix Streaming Guide
